basic.description: This course covers groups, permutation groups, subgroups, group homomorphisms, structure of groups, rings, ideals, ring homomorphisms, rings of quotients, polynomials, factorization, fields, field extensions.
basic.subject: MAS
basic.title: Introduction to Abstract Algebra I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MAS 3105 and prior experience with mathematical proofs (MGF 3301, MAD 2104 or other proving experience).
